title: Cant patch
body: Saying they are having problems with the server and cannot patch, says error code 003

replies.body: We've been having some weird [**patching issues**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) this morning, but it does seem like a lot of players have been able to finally get patched and back in the game. The devs are still working on a concrete fix, but do me a favor in the meantime and try updating your DNS server and port forwarding settings using the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
